item.description:
Meet at 10:30 in the Lincoln commuter rail station.

A walk through the fields and forests of Lincoln's conservation lands. Mt Misery is only about 500 feet high, so it shouldn't be to hard of a climb.

Afterwards we will go for lunch at

The Elephant Walk
663 Main Street
Waltham, MA 02451
781.899.2244

www.elephantwalk.com

Please consider carpooling.
If you need a ride, please say so in your rsvp comments, indicating what area you are in.
item.name: Farrar Pond, Mt. Misery walk - Lincoln
